constituent: invariably, heart, stick, drop, fishhook, drop3
heisigStory: First note the stroke order of this character, which did not really evolve from the heart, even though we take it that way. If one takes it as a pictograph "dividing" the heart in half, then one has one of those invariably true bits of human anatomy: the fact that each heart is divided into two halves.
koohiiStory1: You swear you´ll be in love forever, but invariably there comes a time when your heart is divided.
koohiiStory2: For this kanji I invariably got the stroke order wrong. I nearly lost heart, but decided to stick (pun) to it. Then I noticed the order is 1) katakana ソ (altered slightly); 2) fishhook; 3) two drops. Now I invariably get it right.
myStory: bất biến. chắc chắn. khắc trong tim
words: inevitable death, desperation, frantic, inevitable result
